title: ShroudScope at Sindonology.org
post: Anyone interested (like I am) in the Shroud must use this tool !  It’s great to see some minor details !!!  And, by the way, the guy who did this tool is Mario Latendresse, a guy from Quebec just like me !!!! :-)  And I know Mario personally via email exchanges.  He’s an intelligent person and very interesting to talk with…  Just go see this tool and you won’t be disappointed !
author: Yannick Clément
